## Events.Ui.(constructor)

Constructs a new instance of the `Ui` class

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(opt_block?: Block | null, opt_element?: string, opt_oldValue?: any, opt_newValue?: any);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  opt\_block | [Block](./blockly.block_class.md) \| null | <i>(Optional)</i> The affected block. Null for UI events that do not have an associated block. Undefined for a blank event. |
|  opt\_element | string | <i>(Optional)</i> One of 'selected', 'comment', 'mutatorOpen', etc. |
|  opt\_oldValue | any | <i>(Optional)</i> Previous value of element. |
|  opt\_newValue | any | <i>(Optional)</i> New value of element. |
